#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,j,a[10],i,k,b;
    cin>>t;
    long long int n;
    string str[10]={"-----",".----","..---","...--","....-",".....","-....","--...","---..","----."};
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        j=9; k=0;
        while(n>0)
        {
            a[j--]=b=n%10;
            if(b<6)
                k+=b;
            else
            {
                switch(b)
                {
                    case 6:
                        k+=4;
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        k+=3;
                        break;
                    case 8:
                        k+=2;
                        break;
                    case 9:
                        k+=1;
                        break;
                    }
            }
            n/=10;
        }
        for(i=0;i<10;i++)
            cout<<str[a[i]];
            cout<<"\n"<<k<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
